metadata.title: CVE-2024-36275 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: NULL pointer dereference in some Intel(R) Optane(TM) PMem Managementsoftware versions before CR_MGMT_02.00.00.4040, CR_MGMT_03.00.00.0499 mayallow a authenticated user to potentially enable denial of service vialocal access.

criterions.comment: ipmctl package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
